Package user

Class User

java.lang.Object
user.User
public class User extends Object
Create a user and store their information.

    • addConvert

      public void addConvert(String original, String destination)
      Add the formats the user can translate the data from and to.
      Parameters:
      original - The original data format.
      destination - The translated data format.

    • addFilepaths

      public void addFilepaths(String filepath)
      Add the file path of the file the user wants to share.
      Parameters:
      filepath - The file path of the file.

    • addReceivedMessage

      public void addReceivedMessage(String messageID, Message message)
      Add the received message to user history.
      Parameters:
      messageID - The ID of the received message.
      message - The Message instance of the received message.

    • addFileRequest

      public void addFileRequest(String sourceUserID, String filename)
      Add a file request to sourceUserID mapping in requests.
      Parameters:
      sourceUserID - The user who has the data.
      filename - The name of the file requested.

    • removeFileRequest

      public void removeFileRequest(String sourceUserID, String filename)
      Remove the file request for the sender and delete sender from hash map if no more requests.
      Parameters:
      sourceUserID - The user who has the data.
      filename - The name of the file to be removed from requests.

      public void addRequestMessage(Message message)

    • removeRequestMessage

      public void removeRequestMessage()

    • addTranslationRequest

      public void addTranslationRequest(String filename, String destinationFormat)
      Add a translation request to filename mapping.
      Parameters:
      filename - The filename being requested for translation.
      destinationFormat - The requested format for translation.

    • removeTranslationRequest

      public void removeTranslationRequest(String filename, String destinationFormat)
      Remove the translation request for the filename and remove filename from hash map if no more destination formats.
      Parameters:
      filename - The filename requested for translation.
      destinationFormat - The requested format for translation.

    • getWantFormats

      public List<String> getWantFormats()
      Get the formats the user wants.
      Returns:
      A list of the formats the user wants.

    • getConvertFormats

      public Map<String,ArrayList<String>> getConvertFormats()
      Get all the formats the user can translate.
      Returns:
      A Map of the formats the user can translate from and a list of the formats they can translate the specific format to.

    • getDestinationFormats

      public List<String> getDestinationFormats(String originalFormat)
      Get the formats the user can translate to from a specific format;
      Parameters:
      originalFormat - The original format the user can translate from.
      Returns:
      A list of the formats the user can translate to.

    • getFilepaths

      public List<Path> getFilepaths()
      Get the file paths the user has added.
      Returns:
      A list of the file paths the user has.

    • getAllMessages

      public Map<String,Message> getAllMessages()
      Get all the messages the user has received.
      Returns:
      A map of the message ID's and relating Message instances.

    • getMessage

      public Message getMessage(String messageID)
      Get a specific message the user has received.
      Parameters:
      messageID - The ID of the message wanted.
      Returns:
      A Message instance of the message with the message ID.

    • getUserID

      public String getUserID()
      Get the ID of the user.
      Returns:
      The ID of the user.

      public List<String> getFilesRequested(String sourceUserID)
      Get the list of files requested from a user.
      Parameters:
      sourceUserID - The user who has data.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of filenames requested for the user.

    • getTranslationFormatRequests

      public List<String> getTranslationFormatRequests(String filename)
      Get the list of destination formats requested for a filename.
      Parameters:
      filename - The filename requested for translation.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of destination formats requested by the user.
